attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Afc Wimbledon have recently been in the media quite a lot (well, the Kingston Times...) and have been moaning about their very lenient punishment to deduct 18 points from the league and kick them out of the Surrey Senior Cup, even though they have broken a huge rule in the FA's book... so, we, the undersigned, petition the Prime Minister to demote afc wimbledon.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
